mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pQnA (pdQCode, pdQSubject, pdQContent, pdNum, userId, answerNum, userName, groupNum) VALUES(pdQCode_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{pdQSubject}, #{pdQContent}, #{pdNum}, #{userId}, #{answerNum}, #{userName}, #{groupNum})
mapper.select:
SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM pqna
and pdnum=#{pdnum}
mapper.update: UPDATE pQnA SET pdQSubject=#{pdQSubject}, pdQContent=#{pdQContent} WHERE pdQCode=#{pdQCode}
